sqlMap.insert:
insert into t_trade_log (f_account_id, f_yunying_id, f_character_id, f_character_name, f_character_grade, f_trade_time, f_trade_type, f_original_yuanbao, f_trade_gain_yuanbao, f_trade_character_id, f_goods_count, f_goods_price, f_good_id, f_trade_lost_yuanbao, f_trade_account_id, f_trade_yunying_id, f_server_id) values (#accountId:INTEGER#, #yunyingId:VARCHAR#, #characterId:INTEGER#, #characterName:VARCHAR#, #characterGrade:INTEGER#, #tradeTime:TIMESTAMP#, #tradeType:INTEGER#, #originalYuanbao:INTEGER#, #tradeGainYuanbao:INTEGER#, #tradeCharacterId:INTEGER#, #goodsCount:INTEGER#, #goodsPrice:INTEGER#, #goodId:INTEGER#, #tradeLostYuanbao:INTEGER#, #tradeAccountId:INTEGER#, #tradeYunyingId:VARCHAR#, #serverId:INTEGER#)
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
